title: Spring Landscape
marks:
Inscription and Mark

LLC, Japanese inscription
description: large, rocky cliff-like formation on left side with gnarled pine tree growing off rock face; tranquil body of water near lower center; buildings with tiled roofs near LLC along shoreline; trees LRC; silhouettes of mountains in background
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
